document.full_text: it's not too difficult to see why everybody wants to create a star vehicle for dana delany. she's had crazy screen presence since most people met her on "china beach." and if anything, it has only grown more intense as she's aged.
document.title: sexy medical drama "body of proof" good fit for dana delany
